headline.main: OIL TANKS TARGETS OF BRITISH IN ITALY; Southern Part is Bombed for First Time--Fires Started in Naples--Defense Weak

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Saturday, Nov. 2--The official announcement yesterday that British bombers had bombed oil tanks, a railroad junction and defense positions in Naples and "returned safely to their bases" led to considerable speculation as to where those bases were.
